body.name: PoP voice Microphone Professional for iPhone Lavalier Lapel Omnidirectional Microphone for iPad, iPod, Condenser Mic for iPhone Audio & Video Recording, YouTube, Interview, Podcast, Vlogging(6.6 Feet)

features: Made for iOS Devices - PoP voice professional lavalier lapel microphone is made for iOS devices： for iPhone 12, 12 Pro,for iPhone 11 Pro,11 Pro Max,11, for iPhone XS, XS Max, for iPhone XR, X, 8, 8 Plus, 7, 7Plus, 6, 6S, for iPod touch / for iPad mini. Please note: *This Mic is a professional recording lavalier microphone for iPhone, you can't hear any sound from devices after plugging in the mic.

Excellent Performance Omnidirectional Mic - The lapel microphone for iPhone is made of professional grade premium materials, with the professional sound chip and omnidirectional pickup pattern, it can capture the clear sound around the microphone to help you finally create high quality recording on your iOS devices. This podcast microphone performs much better than the built-in microphones of the iOS devices. Ideal for live broadcast, audio & video recording, interview, vlogging, podcast.

Vlogging Anytime Anywhere - This hands-free condenser clip-on microphone for iPhone is equipped with the PCB built-in RF low noise chip, anti-interference shield cable, and high-quality wind proof fur shield to ensure that the sound is clear and without noise, which helps you to make a successful vlogging anytime and anywhere. You can use it even when you are outdoor to create perfect video or audio recording.

Plug & Play and Easy to Carry - No set-up is needed for this Plug & Play lavalier microphone, no need for batteries or app downloads. Just plug it into your device and you're good to go. Whether you're a content creator or a hobbyist, this lapel mic will be your good choice! Perfect for using on Youtube vlog, Titok, Facebook,etc. Our package also includes an exquisite pouch and high-quality handy velcro, it is convenient for you to collect the lav microphone and put it into your pocket.

Your Satisfaction Means A Lot To Us - When designing this lav mic, we pay great attention to the quality of the product and we value each of our customers' shopping experiences. So we hope that you can enjoy your recording sessions and create great-sounding audio with our professional lavalier microphone. If you have any questions during the use of the microphone, please contact us on Amazon when you are free, we will give you a satisfactory answer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose this External Lav Micphone? 6.6ft Cord Lavalier Microphone for iPhone Video/Audio Recording The lapel mic for iPhone is made of professional-grade premium material, with professional sound chip and Omni pickup pattern, it can capture clear sound around the mic.PoP voice lav mic for iPhone is made of polished and protected steel, it is extremely lightweight, and designed for optimum portability, flexibility, and comfort.The professional-grade mic performs significantly better than majority of the built-in microphones and is suitable for Recording, Interviews, Vlogging, podcasts, etc.

Why Choose PoP voice Lav Mic for iPhone? PoP voice Mic with Professional Mic Chip PoP voice lapel microphone for iPhone is designed with a professional chip. It will work on your iOS devices more safely and more stable, no adapters and batteries are needed, just plug and play.The lav mic is made for iPhone 13/13 Pro, for iPhone 12/12 Pro, for iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max, for iPhone XS/XS Max, for iPhone XR/X/8/8 Plus/7/7Plus.If you need to use this mic for iPad, please note that this mic only supports iPad with lighting port, which is not compatible with any USB C devices.

Plug &Play Lavalier Microphone This is an easy plug in and use lavalier microphone, you only need to plug it and start recording. No adapter and battery needed, easy to use. Easy-to-carry lightweight Mic Package includes an exquisite pouch and high-quality handy velcro, it is convenient for you to collect the clip on mic and put it into your pocket. Omnidirectional Condenser Mic PoP voice lav mic is Omni, naturally boosting performance for clear and accurate voice reproduction, improving the recording experience. Package Includes 1* Lavalier Microphone, 1*Handy Velcro, 2*Wind muffs, 1* Exquisite microphone pouch, 1*Wind Proof Fur Shield

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Changing my Review - works well!
reviews.reviewText: Edit #2: After much troubleshooting, I’ve finally determined that the problem I am having is with the APP I have been using, and not with this product. In fact, once I resolved the problem with my app, I am impressed with the audio I am getting from this microphone. Changing my rating, and my apologies to the seller for my mistake. +1 for your customer service in reaching out to me to rectify the issue. Raising my rating to 5 stars based on a good product and excellent customer service.Edit: I want to be fair to the company that produces / sells this microphone. After I posted the below review, they reached out to me and sent me a free replacement. So kudos for customer service. I really wanted this one to work so I could write my prior bad experience down to it just being a lemon, and give them 5 starts for resolving the issue, but that’s not the case. This new one has the same high-pitched scratching sound as the first one, and is completely unusable. Maybe this mic will work well in a static indoor situation, but for filming outdoor sports where I am moving around the camera to follow the play, it just doesn’t work.Kudos to your customer service, but unfortunately this product just doesn’t work well at all.— Original Review —I bought this for live-streaming youth sports, hoping that using an actual microphone would eliminate wind noise. Every time I speak or the crowd cheers, this microphone turns it into an ear-piercing high-pitched scratching sound. This thing is absolutely worthless. Don’t buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little microphone! Great results!
reviews.reviewText: This simple kit contains a small mic that turns your iPhone into an instant recording Device.my husband and I use it for our singing YouTube channel while on the road.it works very well. Picks up zero background noise. The device is Literally just plug and play. So super easy to use!I appreciate the simplicity of this setup and the length of the cord it perfect for multi tasking.The clip is really handy~ especially for our needs.Has a strong hold and keeps it safe.Overall extremely happy with it and an amazing price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: Got this as a present. Did try it myself, make sure it worked before gifting it. It works nicely however, in order to listen to what you recorded you have to unplug it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Did a test between audio on my regular phone mic and these mics. The sound on the mic is very strong…maybe too strong. If you put it too close by your mouth the audio will distort so be sure to leave it at a good distance, on your lapel is fine I think. It catches good.Not sure about the noise cancellation but as far as capturing audio it’s great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love how easy it is to put into the phone. This microphone is better than my phone because my phone has fallen a few times and went swimming in water. This microphone allows my phone to record like nothing ever happened and I love that it has a clip :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Simply doesn’t work
reviews.reviewText: I plugged it into my iPhone 13 which it says it’s compatible with and nothing happens. I try to make a video video. The audio is completely silent. It doesn’t even pick up my voice from my phone no audio at all. I try to do a call with the microphone and again it doesn’t work. It’s just a piece of junk.

reviews.reviewerName: I bought this mic for recording tik tok videos and it’s a great mic for the price! I highly recommend.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, I’m happy!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Good quality for the price. I might go with a Bluetooth mic at some point as this plugs directly into phone where the charger cord goes and my phone is not always fully charged so a Bluetooth would be nice too. Still love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: dude, i dont know what in the skibidi ohio sigma this microphone is, but its super rizzful, wish it helped me mew though *sigh*
Fácil de usar y me preguntan bastante por el

reviews.reviewTitle: It is a very good product, I used it more than 5 months, everything is fine.
reviews.reviewText: It is a very good product, I used it more than 5 months, everything is fine.

reviews.reviewTitle: Clear audio but got teared off very soon
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this in may month and it got broken in 40-45 days :(Have asked for refund from the company, still not got any processing further..will update this review when any sokution comes up !!
The quality is quite the same as my existing one under AUD $10.
